description:
Get a look at the musicians in Ekoda-chan`s life in this indie-flavored outing by Kobayashi Osamu (Beck, Paradise Kiss) starring Koshoji Megumi from the band Maison Book Girl.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: Kantoku to Ekoda-chan Ra no Zadankai - Kobayashi Osamu x Koshouji Megumi
Rinshi!! Ekoda-chan: The Director and Ekoda-chan`s Naked Chat 11 - Kobayashi Osamu x Koshoji Megumi
臨死!! 江古田ちゃん 監督と江古田ちゃん裸[ら]の座談会 コバヤシオサム x コショージメグミ
